properties.entry: The secret parameter is missing. Please contact your energy company.
The secret parameter is invalid or malformed. Please contact your energy company.
The CAPTCHA is required and cannot be empty. Please check the CAPTCHA form.
The CAPTCHA solution supplied is invalid or malformed. Please try again.

Error while validating host/domain . Please try again or contact your energy company.

The CAPTCHA solution supplied is timed out or duplicate. Please try again.
